content.question: The block and projectile smoothly transition onto the inclined plane. Which of the following is a correct expression for the maximum height that the block moves up the inclined plane in terms of <math alttext="v sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction v sub f squared over 2 g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction v sub f over the square root of 2 g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction uppercase M v sub f squared over 2 lowercase m g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 g over v sub f squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 g over v sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction v sub f squared over 2 g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
